pages.text: The destruction gadget makes clearing a large area very easy. Any blocks cleared will be $(bold)voided!$(clear).$(br2)First, open the settings menu and adjust the area. This area is with respect to the block (and block face) you are looking at.$(br2)If you look at the top face of a block, 'up' will be relative to the player's screen.

pages.title: Destruction Gadget
pages.text: Destroying an area, click the arrow to see diffent pictures!

Once you're satisfied with the settings, right click on a block to void all the highlighted blocks. They will be removed from the world. $(br2)You may undo this action if you make a mistake. It will not remove items from your inventory to undo, as the gadget is just returning the voided blocks to the world.
